ygData.subject: The inspector arrives
ygData.msgSnippet: Apollo, with the help from Megatrons mind, picked a rather fimiliar and feared form. The bots on the planet would know who it was right away, and that would

Subject: The inspector arrives
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: JP3884@...

    Apollo, with the help from Megatrons mind, picked a rather fimiliar and 
feared form. The bots on the planet would know who it was right away, and 
that would mean Apollo could get answers quickly.
    The form was placed in a small sphere, and shot out of the ship, targeted 
to land at the Bunker. Once there, the investigation would begin and if 
nessecery, the bots would all be destroyed.
    The sphere plumeted downward until it hit a little friction entering the 
atmosphere. After the shakey arrival, it landed with a hard crack on the soil 
a few yards away from the opening to the Bunker.

    Aracnia was the first one out of the Bunker. Scans had picked up the 
object and she wanted to know what the hell was going on. Tarantulas followd 
her and saw that Aerostreak, Guantix, Grappler, and Paralysis were all 
gathered around the sphere with Aracnia.
    "Wheres Megatron? Get him! This is his doing!" Aracnia roared, but sure 
enough the lizard was on his way out of the bunker, after passing Darkmouse 
who was asking him if he was alright. He had enough of that little vermine....
    "Im right here! Now, what is that thing?" Megatron said, approaching it. 
His keen eyes looked over the flawless sphere.
    Aracnia hissed back, "You tell us, your the one who talked with the 
Aliens."
    Tarantulas suddenly squeeked because the sphere opened. The being inside 
steped out. His body was a fimiliar red, purple, and black. But what sent 
shivers down there backs was his voice. It sounded just like him.....
    " Greetings and salutations Predacons. I trust you know Im here to 
investigate what has happened here at Bunker 3571?"
    Aracnia was in awe. Apollo chose a fimiliar form indeed. The being 
standing before them was the replica of Hell Beast, sent to investigate and 
then to destroy.
